commandsExampleMap.FixCellData: php command.php csvTool fixCellData --source="data/source.csv" --dest="data/dest.csv" --cells="Work Email, Mobile Phone" --delimiter="," --delimiterInsideCell=","

FixCellData.delimiterInsideCell: Delimiter inside a cell, e.g. "email1@sample.com, email2@sample.com,"
FixCellData.cells: List of cells wich data should be fixed, e.g. "Phone Number, Work Email".
